channel.title: Help with drops on death
channel.description: Hello. My problem is that with pking on my source i downloaded, when you get killed, you keep your stuff.... How can i make it that all your stuff is dropped on death?? I searched on the tutorials section, but i couldn't find anything.. PLZ help me, i really need it. Thanks already. Greetz, Nick.

item.title: Help with drops on death
item.dc:creator: @i_pked_ya i pked ya
item.description:
@i_pked_ya wrote:

`Rich:

Loop through all the player’s inventory/equipment and remove t/drop it on the ground to the player who killed them.

umm yeah i have the same problem and that info yo gave didn’t really help at all lols (i guess cause I’m still a noob at coding)

Read full topic

item.title: Help with drops on death

item.description:

Loop through all the player’s inventory/equipment and remove t/drop it on the ground to the player who killed them.

item.title: Help with drops on death
item.dc:creator: @NickGames NickGames
item.description:
@NickGames wrote:

Hello.
My problem is that with pking on my source i downloaded, when you get killed, you keep your stuff…
How can i make it that all your stuff is dropped on death??
I searched on the tutorials section, but i couldn’t find anything…
PLZ help me, i really need it.
Thanks already.
Greetz,
Nick.

Read full topic
